section.title: Setting up Lists
section.para: In this section you will learn how to set up lists using pt_extlist. We will guide you step by step through the TypoScript configuration and show you how to use pt_extlist's widgets as page content.

section.title: Widgets overview
section.para: Get an overview of what the individual widgets are doing and how they look like in the frontend. All widgets depend on a list identifier set up in TypoScript and selected within the FlexForm of your plugin.

section.title: List widget
section.para: Renders a list of data set up by configuration. Can use headers for sorting list data by certain columns.

section.title: Filter widgets
section.para: Renders filterboxes containing multiple filters defined by configuration.

section.title: Pager widget
section.para: Renders a pager as configured by configuration. Pager limits rows of list to configured amount per page.

section.title: Breadcrumbs widget
section.para: Breadcrumbs show which filters are activated and which values they have.

section.title: Bookmarks widget
section.para: Bookmarks enable user to save certain list settings like filters, pager, sortings and reload them again afterwards.

section.title: List Identifier and TypoScript namespace
section.para: Each list has its own identifier.
